title: Tropical Bliss
description: Experience the paradise in a glass with this tropical delight.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add 50 ml of rum, 30 ml of pineapple juice, and 20 ml of coconut cream.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain into a hurricane glass filled with ice.
Garnish with pineapple chunks and a cherry.
Enjoy your tropical bliss!

title: Crisp Citrus Fizz
description: A refreshing citrusy delight that will tickle your taste buds.
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 50 ml of gin, 30 ml of fresh orange juice, and 20 ml of triple sec.
Top up with club soda and stir gently.
Garnish with an orange slice.
Sip and enjoy the crispness!

title: Minty Mojito Madness
description: A classic Cuban cocktail with a twist of extra minty freshness.
instructions: Muddle fresh mint leaves and a lime wedge in a Collins glass.
Fill the glass with ice.
Add 50 ml of white rum and 20 ml of simple syrup.
Top up with club soda and stir gently.
Garnish with mint sprigs and a lime wheel.
Enjoy the minty madness!

title: Summer Breeze
description: A light and fruity cocktail to cool you down on a hot summer day.
instructions: In a shaker, combine 40 ml of vodka, 20 ml of elderflower liqueur, and 30 ml of cranberry juice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a twist of lemon.
Sip and feel the summer breeze!

title: Spicy Paloma
description: A bold and spicy twist on the classic Paloma cocktail.
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice.
Add 60 ml of tequila, 30 ml of grapefruit juice, and a splash of jalape√±o-infused agave syrup.
Stir gently and garnish with a grapefruit wedge.
Get ready for a spicy kick!

title: Golden Margarita
description: A luxurious twist on the classic margarita with a hint of honey and gold.
instructions: Run a lime wedge around the rim of a margarita glass and dip it in edible gold dust.
In a shaker, mix 50 ml of gold tequila, 30 ml of triple sec, and 20 ml of honey syrup with ice.
Shake well and strain into the prepared glass.
Sip and indulge in the golden goodness!

title: Berry Smash
description: A vibrant and fruity cocktail that's a burst of berry goodness.
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle a handful of mixed berries and a dash of simple syrup.
Add 60 ml of bourbon and fill the glass with ice.
Stir gently and garnish with a skewer of fresh berries.
Smash your way into berry bliss!

title: Coconut Creamsicle
description: A tropical twist on the classic creamsicle with a hint of coconut goodness.
instructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice.
Add 50 ml of coconut rum, 30 ml of vanilla vodka, and 60 ml of orange juice.
Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.
Transport yourself to a tropical paradise!

title: Peachy Keen Bellini
description: A delightful peach-infused twist on the classic Bellini cocktail.
instructions: In a blender, combine 100 g of fresh peaches and a splash of peach schnapps.
Blend until smooth and strain into a flute glass.
Top up with chilled Prosecco and gently stir.
Raise your glass to peachy perfection!
